name: correct_normalize
diff:
--- a/src/solution.py
+++ b/src/solution.py
@@ -1,3 +1,4 @@
 def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
-    # BUG: does not normalize whitespace / punctuation / casing
-    return s == s[::-1]
+    # Normalize: lowercase and remove spaces.
+    t = "".join(ch.lower() for ch in s if not ch.isspace())
+    return t == t[::-1]
